ygData.subject: Anyone noticed this.. (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone else noticed anything screwy since the last patch?  I m not talking songs being out of whack or anything to that effect.  I had only had one crash
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone else noticed anything screwy since the last patch? I'm not talking songs being out of whack or anything to that effect. I had only had one crash to the desktop in the whole time I've been playing. Since the last patch, I've locked up on the login screen 5 times and crashed completely twice -- each one requiring a reboot. I haven't installed anything since then or even prior to the patch so I was just seeing if anyone else was experiencing the same sort of thing.

On the other hand though, the random number generator seems to have taken a liking to me last night. I was camping the goblin foreman in SolA for some quick cash. We were there 2 hours and the foreman (20 min spawn) spawned 4 out of the six times we were there. Every time he had an obsidian scimitar! 6 spawns, 4 foremen, 4 OS's -- too bad we had a druid with us that was in dire need of a tunic.....but I'm not complaining =)

Weiland
Erollisi Marr
<Disciples of Truth>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
